scripts.clean: rm -rf www && sudo npm run clean:platforms && npm run prepare
scripts.clean:platforms: cordova platform rm browser && cordova platform rm android && cordova platform rm ios
scripts.prepare: npm run prepare:folders && sudo cordova prepare
scripts.prepare:folders: mkdir -p www/js && mkdir -p www/vendors && mkdir -p www/css && mkdir -p work/dist && npm run prepare:copy
scripts.prepare:copy: cp work/index.html www && cp -r work/assets www && npm run copy:vendors
scripts.copy:vendors: cp node_modules/requirejs/require.js www/vendors && cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.js www/vendors && cp node_modules/underscore/underscore.js www/vendors && cp node_modules/backbone/backbone.js www/vendors
scripts.build:dev: npm run prepare:copy && npm run build:css && npm run copy:map && npm run build:js
